identity.bioSummary: Russian-speaking traveler drawn to history, moody nature, and night city energy; balances museums and memorials with hikes, hot springs, and underground club nights.

interests.label: History / Memory – museums, memorials, castles
interests.description: WWII memory sites, medieval armory and fortress tours, ancient civilizations (incl. Egypt); favors context-rich, accurate storytelling.

interests.label: Nature / Scenic Hikes – volcanic islands & hot springs
interests.description: Dramatic coasts, laurel forests, mountain viewpoints; enjoys post-hike thermal pools and moody weather scenes.

interests.label: Urban Exploration – dusk views, old quarters, rooftops
interests.description: City character after dark: riverfronts, university/old-town architecture, street cats, late-night food.

interests.label: Nightlife – techno/industrial, DnB/trance, retro nights
interests.description: Underground warehouse raves, big-room techno, drum & bass, and playful 80s/90s parties.

interests.label: Gaming Aesthetics IRL – castles, armor, fairs
interests.description: CRPG/strategy nostalgia mapped to real places: castle towns, armory museums, medieval fairs, LARP/reenactment, boardgame bars.

interests.label: Geopolitics & Reality Tours – socio-political lens
interests.description: Curious about cities beyond brochures: socio-political museums, guided reality walks, alternative neighborhoods.
